name: 逃离宫殿 Escape From the Palace
name_original: 逃离宫殿 Escape From the Palace
description:
• This is a simple 3D platform jumping game, developed by myself (Yufei Ge), as a practice work on the way to learn Unreal Engine 5. Welcome to try out this game!
  • There are five levels in this game, with progressively increasing difficulty. Each level adds a new mechanic, and the last level incorporates all of them.
  • The sound effects in this game are free to download from the freesound.org website.
  • The very nice background music in this game is downloaded from itch.io's free game music called Truth - Dead Seed (Namastaii).
  • The unique font in this game is called RubikMaze and is available for free download at fonts.google.com. Copyright 2020 The Rubik Filtered Project Authors (https://https://github.com/NaN-xyz/Rubik- Filtered).
